attributes.action: Allow all to be furloughed if they took a new job after Feb 28th and before JRS.
attributes.additional_details: Otherwise they would lose new role and unable return to work and be made to seek JSA instead.
attributes.background: Allow New employees who joined a company after Feb 28th and before the JRS scheme announcement was made to be able to be furloughed if they have a valid contract and employment offer.
